q: Susan Boyle shot to fame after auditioning for Simon Cowell 's Britain's Got Talent TV show, and she told the music mogul she dreamed of becoming as successful as her idol Elaine Paige . Elaine Paige subsequently labelled Susan Boyle a virus that swept the world , but made up for the slur by performing her track from the Chess musical I Know Him So Well with the unlikely superstar on a U.K. TV special. Donald Rumsfeld 's top regret: not quitting after Abu Ghraib Former US defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld spared no criticism of his colleagues in his new memoir Tuesday, but also admitted in an interview the country would've been better off if he had quit after the 2004 Abu Ghraib scandal. In`` Known and Unknown,'' Donald Rumsfeld defends his handling of the war and recounts his government career serving Republican George W. Bushs from Richard Nixon to George W. Bush

At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan , who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt Ryan is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. Eric Schmidt wurde in der ffentlichkeit oft als eine etwas finstere Figur gerade bei der Datenschutzfrage wahrgenommen und hat dazu mit einigen ungl?cklichen u?erungen in Interviews auch selbst beigetragen( Wenn es etwas gibt, von dem Sie nicht wollen, dass es jemand erf?hrt, vielleicht sollten Sie es dann gar nicht erst tun. ) Die amerikanische Verbraucherschutzorganisation`` Consumer Watchdog'' sah jedenfalls den F?hrungswechsel bei Google als Anlass genug, selbst eine Pressemitteilung herauszugeben, in der sie die Ernennung von Larry Page zum Vorstandsvorsitzenden und den Abgang von Eric Schmidt ausdr?cklich begr?te.

Clippers' Blake Griffin grows into one-man highlight film Don't get dunked on is Michael Beasley 's sage advice. LOS ANGELES- Timberwolves forward Kevin Love remembers a time before Blake Griffin produced statistics not seen from an NBA rookie since Allen Iverson or maybe Michael Jordan came into the league.
